.,,:::,,, ::`.:,   ... .. .:,     .:. ..`... ..`   ..   .:,    .. ::  .::,     .:,`

   ,::    :::  ::: ::, :::  :::`::.  :::.,::  ::,`::`:::   ::: :::  `::,`   :::   ::: 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  :::.::    ::.,::  :::::: ::::::::: ::`   :::::: ::::::::: 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  :::.::    ::.,::  .::::: ::::::::: ::`    ::::::::::::::: 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  ::: ::: `:::.,::   ::::  :::`  ,,, ::`  .::  :::.::.  ,,, 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  ::: ::::::::.,::   ::::   :::::::` ::`   ::::::: :::::::. 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  :::  :::::::`,::    ::.    :::::`  ::`   ::::::   :::::.

http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3162517
Ender 3 Cable Chain - Plate Mount - 10 DEG by Ryguitar07 is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution license.
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

# Summary

====================================================================
Ender 3 Cable Chain - Plate Mount - 10 Deg

This is a remix off the popular cable chain made by johnniewhiskey.  My Ender came with the bed strain relief at ~10deg angle to the Y Axis of the printer. This part accounts for that angle and keeps your cable chain running parallel to the Y axis

 - Relieves strain from ~10deg angled bed wires
 - Compatible with Ender 3 Cable Chain by johnniewhiskey
 - Print with the same settings as johnniewhiskey's design
 - **Pictures are of original design, and my design accounting for the 10deg angle**

Please download and let me know what you think!

====================================================================

# Print Settings

Printer Brand: Creality
Printer: Ender 3
Rafts: No
Supports: No
Resolution: .2
Infill: 20
